paragraphs.text: Just like Facebook’s disingenuous and evil takeover plot renamed “Free Basics”, the term Net Neutrality in the US actually means “give the feds full and complete regulatory power over the Internet.”
paragraphs.name: f18f

paragraphs.text: Whatsapp had made messaging free of cost. Before Whatsapp, we had to buy costly messaging packs to send short messages. Every international message used to cost around Rs 5 (US $0.08) — a huge source of revenue for telecoms.
paragraphs.name: 4a54

5d1a4879350.title: Jio is a different issue altogether.

paragraphs.text: Jio is a different issue altogether. Instead of some company giving free access to some parts of the internet, we have a company which gives free access to full internet but will use (’misue’) all the information it can get from people’s internet usage.
paragraphs.name: acc7

paragraphs.text: In reality, it’s very similar to the situation in America that you talk about.

416fd0335f40.title: Fear mongering won the day an year back.

paragraphs.text: Fear mongering won the day an year back. Fear mongering is celebrated an year later, in articles like these. Sadly, the whole Free Basics controversy in India was between 2 groups with deeply flawed interests. Fact that one of them has won is of little consequence.

8e656dc7fc5a.title: In the US, every monopoly by an “evil corporation” was granted to them by the government.

paragraphs.text: In the US, every monopoly by an “evil corporation” was granted to them by the government. There’s no better way to obtain one.
Every time the government is allowed to “regulate” an industry, it gets into bed with that industry. Individual companies or industry lobbyists write the proposed legislation, which is always self…

paragraphs.text: This isn’t true. Net Neutrality is a simple framework that means internet service providers (ISPs) — who are basically a handful of regional monopolies like Comcast and AT&T — are not able to:
paragraphs.name: cf91

paragraphs.text: block websites
paragraphs.name: 526b

paragraphs.text: slow down websites
paragraphs.name: 871b

paragraphs.text: or accept money in exchange for speeding up…
paragraphs.name: f657

3a5ccf338b1e.title: India’s triumph over corporate control is a very good story.

paragraphs.text: India’s triumph over corporate control is a very good story. Here in the US though, the term “Net Neutrality” means Federal regulation of the Internet.
That’s bad. Whenever you see Federal regulation you see freedom and neutrality sold to the highest bidder.
paragraphs.name: ea0d

virtuals.subtitle: That’s bad. Whenever you see Federal regulation you see freedom and neutrality sold to the highest bidder.

content.subtitle: That’s bad. Whenever you see Federal regulation you see freedom and neutrality sold to the highest bidder.
